name: git-secrets
author: awslabs
description: Prevents you from committing secrets and credentials into git repositories

name: gitleaks
author: zricethezav
description: Scan git repos (or files) for secrets using regex and entropy

name: truffleHog
author: dxa4481
description: Searches through git repositories for high entropy strings and secrets, digging deep into commit history

name: gitGraber
author: hisxo
description: gitGraber: monitor GitHub to search and find sensitive data in real time for different online services

name: talisman
author: thoughtworks
description: By hooking into the pre-push hook provided by Git, Talisman validates the outgoing changeset for things that look suspicious - such as authorization tokens and private keys

name: GitGot
author: BishopFox
description: Semi-automated, feedback-driven tool to rapidly search through troves of public data on GitHub for sensitive secrets

name: git-all-secrets
author: anshumanbh
description: A tool to capture all the git secrets by leveraging multiple open source git searching tools

name: github-search
author: gwen001
description: Tools to perform basic search on GitHub

name: git-vuln-finder
author: cve-search
description: Finding potential software vulnerabilities from git commit messages

author: https://github.com/x1sec/commit-stream
description: OSINT tool for finding Github repositories by extracting commit logs in real time from the Github event API

name: gitrob
author: michenriksen
description: Reconnaissance tool for GitHub organizations

name: repo-supervisor
author: auth0
description: Scan your code for security misconfiguration, search for passwords and secrets

name: GitMiner
author: UnkL4b
description: Tool for advanced mining for content on Github

name: sshgit
author: eth0izzle
description: Ah shhgit! Find GitHub secrets in real time

name: detect-secrets
author: Yelp
description: An enterprise friendly way of detecting and preventing secrets in code

name: rusty-hog
author: newrelic
description: A suite of secret scanners built in Rust for performance. Based on TruffleHog

name: whispers
author: Skyscanner
description: Identify hardcoded secrets and dangerous behaviours

name: Yar
author: nielsing
description: Yar is a tool for plunderin' organizations, users and/or repositories

name: dufflebag
author: BishopFox
description: Search exposed EBS volumes for secrets

name: secret-bridge
author: duo-labs
description: Monitors Github for leaked secrets

name: earlybird
author: americanexpress
description: EarlyBird is a sensitive data detection tool capable of scanning source code repositories for clear text password violations, PII, outdated cryptography methods, key files and more

name: /Trufflehog-Chrome-Extension
author: trufflesecurity
description: Trufflehog-Chrome-Extension
